title: Brazen robbers target diners at exclusive Mayfair shisha restaurant opposite Saudi Arabian embassy
text:
This is the dramatic moment brazen robbers target customers at an exclusive Mayfair shisha restaurant.

CCTV footage shows two masked men approaching the outside seated area of the Mamounia Lounge on Curzon Street early on Friday evening.

One appears to be holding a blunt weapon which he waves in the direction of the terrified customers.

CCTV footage shows two masked men approaching the outside seated area of the Mamounia Lounge on Curzon Street early on Friday evening

Another man wearing a bright yellow jacket then heads towards one diner and grapples with him as he tries to pull off his watch.

The other customers stand up and are helpless in stopping the robbery taking place.

At the same time, the other man races up and down the side of the restaurant, alarming diners as he waves his weapon.

After wrestling off the watch, the pair start to flee the scene.

But the man whose watch was taken tries to follow them before knocking over the shisha stand.

One man wearing a bright yellow jacket heads towards one diner and grapples with him as he tries to pull off his watch

The man whose watch was taken tries to follow them before knocking over the shisha stand

Another man tries to chase but falls over in his pursuit.

The upmarket restaurant is located directly opposite the Saudi Arabian embassy in Mayfair.

MailOnline has contacted the Metropolitan Police for a statement on the shocking incident.
description: CCTV footage shows two masked men approaching the outside seated area of the Mamounia Lounge on Curzon Street early on Friday evening before one man grapples a watch off a diner.
